name: Eberharter Raimund
description: Nice, family run bed and breakfast, in a quiet and sunny location. Very close to ski bus stop, cross country ski trail, small supermarket and guest houses. Guest lounge, terrace, garden, ski cellar with shoe dryer, car park, cooking facilities for making snacks. Catering: Extensive breakfast buffet, rooms with television;
Our house can be found in the middle of Eckertau, just before Mayrhofen.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description: Apartment with bedroom, lounge and kitchen, Sat-TV, balcony and cloakroom, fully equipped bathroom.
